availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John C. Hinton (Fleming County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Ann Kirk Hinton on March 19, 1835. Father of Malinda Jane Hinton, Susan O. Hinton, and Mary E. Hinton. Farmer in Fleming County in 1850 and 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, Division 2, p. 405. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, District 2, p. 56. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Indiana, Knox County, Vigo, p. 10. Fleming County, Kentucky, Marriage Index, 1798-1857, Ancestry, 1835. U.S. IRS Tax Assessment Lists, 1862-1918, Ancestry, Kentucky, 1865, Collection District 6, Division 2, p. 49.
